title: The Shamrock Crown and the Legend of Excalibur
description: What would happen if you mix the love of a large family, the hope expressed in Irish folklore, and the faith symbolized in Arthurian legend?Get ready for a magical adventure, filled with the clashing of swords and the splintering of jousting lances, the awakening of champions, the confrontation of light and dark forces spanning centuries, and the magic of the movies.Join Arthur and his family as they dig into the Arthurian legends, with the help of colorful, dynamic, and magical characters, including the King of the Wee Folk and Knights of the Round Table as they fight against the descendants of Morgan le Fey and other ancient evils to race to save the "Message of Truth."Follow as they travel through the soaring Cliffs of Moher, the dramatic Arches of Tintern Abbey, Warwick Castle, the fairy forest of Blarney, and the mystical Stone Rings of Britain on this magical adventure of faith, magic, and family.
author: Arthur Cola (illustrations by John Colaianni)
